extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from CLST101; CLST102; CLST103

basic.description: An introduction to major themes in the development of Greek civilization using the evidence of literature, history and archaeology. Some attention will be given to those aspects of ancient cultural and intellectual growth that are of significance in the western tradition.
basic.subject: CLST
basic.title: Introduction to Greek Civilization
